hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #an Odd Mushroom#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb North Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Red Potion Bottle#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #6# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: I've heard Ganon dislikes lemon-flavored popsicles.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Bottom

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Saria's Song#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Mirror Shield# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path of #Skulls#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #an Odd Mushroom#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple First Mirror Left Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #Deku Nut Capacity#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Big Poe Bottle#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: ${12 68 31}Don't forget to stand up and stretch regularly.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Saria's Song#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Game Key# and #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.
